sourceTables.query: select contactid as PatientUniqueIdentifier,modifiedon,msemr_azurefhirid as PatientFhirId, 636 as Party_Type,'contact' as Party_Name from contact_partitioned

select msdynci_customerprofileid as PatientUniqueIdentifier,modifiedon,{{ci_profile_id}} as PatientFhirId, 636 as Party_Type,'msdynci_customerprofile' as Party_Name from msdynci_customerprofile_partitioned

select Id as Id, msdynmkt_subject as Subject,msdynmkt_name as Name, statuscode as Status_Code, msdynmkt_fromname as From_Name, msdynmkt_replytoemail as Reply_To_Field, msdynmkt_emailcontentlanguage as Language_Code, msdynmkt_fromemail as From_Email, CASE WHEN statecode = 0 THEN 'Active' ELSE 'Inactive' END AS State_Code, modifiedon,createdon as Created_On,createdon as Communication_Status_Time_Stamp from msdynmkt_email_partitioned

select msdynmkt_smsid as Id,msdynmkt_name as Name, statuscode as Status_Code,CAST(regexp_replace(msdynmkt_senderphonenumber, '[^0-9]', '') AS string) as Sender_Phone_Number, modifiedon,createdon as Created_On,CASE WHEN statecode = 0 THEN 'Active' ELSE 'Inactive' END AS State_Code,createdon as Communication_Status_Time_Stamp from msdynmkt_sms_partitioned

select Id as Id,Id as Software_Product_Id,Id as Software_Product_Version_Number , msdynmkt_name as Name,msdynmkt_appname as App_Name, statuscode as Status_Code, msdynmkt_description as Description, msdynmkt_title as Title,createdon as Created_On ,modifiedon ,CASE WHEN statecode = 0 THEN 'Active' ELSE 'Inactive' END AS State_Code,createdon as Communication_Status_Time_Stamp,'Push Notification App Name' as Software_Product_Version_Note from msdynmkt_pushnotification_partitioned

select j.msdynmkt_journeyid as Journey_Id,coalesce(j.msdynmkt_baseversionjourneyid,j.msdynmkt_journeyid) as Base_Version_Journey_Id,j.msdynmkt_journeystarttime as Journey_Start_Time,j.msdynmkt_journeyendtime as Journey_End_Time,j.msdynmkt_name as Journey_Name,j.modifiedon,20000001 as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Type_Id_Value,j.msdynmkt_versionnumber as Version_Number,j.statuscode as Status_Code,j.createdon,j.createdon as Task_Status_End,CASE WHEN j.statecode = 0 THEN 'Draft' WHEN j.statecode = 1 THEN 'Live' WHEN j.statecode = 2 THEN 'Stopped' WHEN j.statecode = 3 THEN 'Publishing' WHEN j.statecode = 4 THEN 'Deleted' WHEN j.statecode = 5 THEN 'Completing' WHEN j.statecode = 6 THEN 'Completed' END AS STATE_CODE,c.msemr_code as Service_Line_Code,'Journey to base version of journey' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note,20000043 as RelationShip_Type from msdynmkt_journey_partitioned j left join msemr_codeableconcept_partitioned c on j.msemr_serviceline = c.msemr_codeableconceptid where j.msdynmkt_journeyid!= 'NULL'

SELECT ji.modifiedon,ji.createdon as Journey_Instane_Created_On,ji.msdynmkt_journeyinstancestate as Journey_Instance_State,ji.msdynmkt_journeydefinitionid  as Definition_Id,ji.msdynmkt_journeyinstanceid as Instance_Id,ji.msdynmkt_targetentity as Entity_Name,ji.msdynmkt_targetid as Target_Record_Id,20000002 as Campaign_Task_Type_Id_Value,ji.createdon as Current_Date_Time, 20000000 as RelationShip_Type,20000000 as Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,'Related Journey' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM msdynmkt_journeyinstance_partitioned ji

SELECT jd.modifiedon,jd.createdon as Communication_Status_Time_Stamp, jd.createdon as Journey_Dependency_Created_On,jd.msdynmkt_journeydependencyId as Journey_Dependency_Id,jd.msdynmkt_actiontype as Action_Type,jd.msdynmkt_dependency as Related_Communication,jd.msdynmkt_journey as Related_JourneyId, CASE WHEN jd.statuscode = 1 THEN 'Active' ELSE 'Inactive' END as Journey_Dependency_StausCode,CASE WHEN jd.statecode = 0 THEN 'Active' ELSE 'Inactive' END AS STATE_CODE,'Related Communication' as Communication_Note,'Journey dependency to Journey' as Task_Communication_Note FROM msdynmkt_journeydependency_partitioned jd where jd.msdynmkt_journeydependencyId!='NULL'

SELECT modifiedon,msdynmkt_journeydependencyId as Journey_Dependency_Id,msdynmkt_actionid as Action_Id,'Journey dependency to Journey action' as Task_Communication_Note,20000000 as Campaign_Task_Type_Id_Value FROM msdynmkt_journeydependency_partitioned where msdynmkt_journeydependencyId!='NULL'

Select ae.Timestamp as modifiedon,ae.Timestamp as CreatedOn,20000002 as RelationShip_Type,20000007 as Campaign_Task_Type_Id_Value,COALESCE(ae.IdempotencyId,ae.InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Internal_Marketing_Interaction_Id,ae.ProfileId as Target_Record_Id,ae.ProfileType as Target_Entity_Name,ae.CustomerJourneyId as Customer_Journey_Id,'Action Event to Journey' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note,20000001 as Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,ae.MessageId as Message_Id,ae.ActionStatus as Action_Event_Status,'Action event related Communication' as Message_Note FROM actionevent ae
select Timestamp as modifiedon,OrganizationId as Party_Id,511 as Party_Type,'Organization' as Party_Name FROM actionevent

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000001 as RelationShip_Type_JI ,JourneyRunId as Journey_Run_Id,'Action Event to Journey Instance' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM actionevent

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000003 as RelationShip_Type ,JourneyActionId as Journey_Action_Id,'Action Event to Journey Action' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM actionevent

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Campaign_Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,Timestamp as Org_Created_On,20000002 as Org_Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,OrganizationId as Org_Target_Record_Id FROM actionevent

Select je.Timestamp as modifiedon,je.Timestamp as CreatedOn,20000005 as RelationShip_Type,20000003 as Campaign_Task_Type_Id_Value,COALESCE(je.IdempotencyId,je.InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Internal_Marketing_Interaction_Id,je.ProfileId as Target_Record_Id,je.ProfileType as Target_Entity_Name,je.CustomerJourneyId as Customer_Journey_Id,'Journey Event to Journey' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note,20000003 as Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,je.JourneyStatus as Journey_Status FROM journeyevent je

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000004 as RelationShip_Type_JI ,JourneyRunId as Journey_Run_Id,'Journey Event to Journey Instance' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM journeyevent

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Campaign_Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,Timestamp as Org_Created_On,20000004 as Org_Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,OrganizationId as Org_Target_Record_Id FROM journeyevent

Select ec.Timestamp as modifiedon,ec.Timestamp as CreatedOn,20000008 as RelationShip_Type,20000008 as Campaign_Task_Type_Id_Value,COALESCE(ec.IdempotencyId,ec.InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Internal_Marketing_Interaction_Id,ec.ProfileId as Target_Record_Id,ec.ProfileType as Target_Entity_Name,ec.CustomerJourneyId as Customer_Journey_Id,'Email Clicked to Journey' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note,20000005 as Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,ec.MessageId as Message_Id,'Email Clicked related Communication' as Message_Note FROM emailclicked ec

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000007 as RelationShip_Type_JI ,JourneyRunId as Journey_Run_Id,'Email Clicked to Journey Instance' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM emailclicked

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000009 as RelationShip_Type ,JourneyActionId as Journey_Action_Id,'Email Clicked to Journey Action' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM emailclicked

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Campaign_Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,Timestamp as Org_Created_On,20000006 as Org_Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,OrganizationId as Org_Target_Record_Id FROM emailclicked

Select ed.Timestamp as modifiedon,ed.Timestamp as CreatedOn,20000010 as RelationShip_Type,20000009 as Campaign_Task_Type_Id_Value,COALESCE(ed.IdempotencyId,ed.InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Internal_Marketing_Interaction_Id,ed.ProfileId as Target_Record_Id,ed.ProfileType as Target_Entity_Name,ed.CustomerJourneyId as Customer_Journey_Id,'Email Delivered to Journey' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note,20000007 as Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,ed.MessageId as Message_Id,'Email Delivered related Communication' as Message_Note FROM emaildelivered ed

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000011 as RelationShip_Type_JI ,JourneyRunId as Journey_Run_Id,'Email Delivered to Journey Instance' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM emaildelivered

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000012 as RelationShip_Type ,JourneyActionId as Journey_Action_Id,'Email Delivered to Journey Action' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM emaildelivered

Select eo.Timestamp as modifiedon,eo.Timestamp as CreatedOn,20000013 as RelationShip_Type,20000005 as Campaign_Task_Type_Id_Value,COALESCE(eo.IdempotencyId,eo.InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Internal_Marketing_Interaction_Id,eo.ProfileId as Target_Record_Id,eo.ProfileType as Target_Entity_Name,eo.CustomerJourneyId as Customer_Journey_Id,'Email Opened to Journey' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note,20000009 as Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,eo.MessageId as Message_Id,'Email Opened related Communication' as Message_Note FROM emailopened eo

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000014 as RelationShip_Type_JI ,JourneyRunId as Journey_Run_Id,'Email Opened to Journey Instance' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM emailopened

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000015 as RelationShip_Type ,JourneyActionId as Journey_Action_Id,'Email Opened to Journey Action' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM emailopened

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Campaign_Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,Timestamp as Org_Created_On,20000010 as Org_Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,OrganizationId as Org_Target_Record_Id FROM emailopened

Select es.Timestamp as modifiedon,es.Timestamp as CreatedOn,20000016 as RelationShip_Type,20000004 as Campaign_Task_Type_Id_Value,COALESCE(es.IdempotencyId,es.InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Internal_Marketing_Interaction_Id,es.ProfileId as Target_Record_Id,es.ProfileType as Target_Entity_Name,es.CustomerJourneyId as Customer_Journey_Id,'Email Sent to Journey' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note,20000011 as Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,es.MessageId as Message_Id,'Email Sent related Communication' as Message_Note FROM emailsent es

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000017 as RelationShip_Type_JI ,JourneyRunId as Journey_Run_Id,'Email Sent to Journey Instance' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM emailsent

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000018 as RelationShip_Type ,JourneyActionId as Journey_Action_Id,'Email Sent to Journey Action' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM emailsent

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Campaign_Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,Timestamp as Org_Created_On,20000012 as Org_Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,OrganizationId as Org_Target_Record_Id FROM emailsent

Select sd.Timestamp as modifiedon,sd.Timestamp as CreatedOn,20000019 as RelationShip_Type,20000010 as Campaign_Task_Type_Id_Value,COALESCE(sd.IdempotencyId,sd.InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Internal_Marketing_Interaction_Id,sd.ProfileId as Target_Record_Id,sd.ProfileType as Target_Entity_Name,sd.CustomerJourneyId as Customer_Journey_Id,'Sms Delivered to Journey' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note,20000013 as Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,sd.MessageId as Message_Id,'Sms Delivered related Communication' as Message_Note FROM smsdelivered sd

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000020 as RelationShip_Type_JI ,JourneyRunId as Journey_Run_Id,'Sms Delivered to Journey Instance' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM smsdelivered

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000021 as RelationShip_Type ,JourneyActionId as Journey_Action_Id,'Sms Delivered to Journey Action' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM smsdelivered

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Campaign_Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,Timestamp as Org_Created_On,20000014 as Org_Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,OrganizationId as Org_Target_Record_Id FROM smsdelivered

Select slc.Timestamp as modifiedon,slc.Timestamp as CreatedOn,20000022 as RelationShip_Type,20000011 as Campaign_Task_Type_Id_Value,COALESCE(slc.IdempotencyId,slc.InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Internal_Marketing_Interaction_Id,slc.ProfileId as Target_Record_Id,slc.ProfileType as Target_Entity_Name,slc.CustomerJourneyId as Customer_Journey_Id,'Sms Link Clicked to Journey' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note,20000015 as Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,slc.MessageId as Message_Id,'Sms Link Clicked related Communication' as Message_Note FROM smslinkclicked slc

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000023 as RelationShip_Type_JI ,JourneyRunId as Journey_Run_Id,'Sms Link Clicked to Journey Instance' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM smslinkclicked

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000024 as RelationShip_Type ,JourneyActionId as Journey_Action_Id,'Sms Link Clicked to Journey Action' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM smslinkclicked

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Campaign_Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,Timestamp as Org_Created_On,20000016 as Org_Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,OrganizationId as Org_Target_Record_Id FROM smslinkclicked

Select ss.Timestamp as modifiedon,ss.Timestamp as CreatedOn,20000025 as RelationShip_Type,20000006 as Campaign_Task_Type_Id_Value,COALESCE(ss.IdempotencyId,ss.InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Internal_Marketing_Interaction_Id,ss.ProfileId as Target_Record_Id,ss.ProfileType as Target_Entity_Name,ss.CustomerJourneyId as Customer_Journey_Id,'Sms Sent to Journey' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note,20000017 as Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,ss.MessageId as Message_Id,'Sms Sent related Communication' as Message_Note FROM smssent ss

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000026 as RelationShip_Type_JI ,JourneyRunId as Journey_Run_Id,'Sms Sent to Journey Instance' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM smssent

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000027 as RelationShip_Type ,JourneyActionId as Journey_Action_Id,'Sms Sent to Journey Action' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM smssent

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Campaign_Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,Timestamp as Org_Created_On,20000018 as Org_Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,OrganizationId as Org_Target_Record_Id FROM smssent

Select sns.Timestamp as modifiedon,sns.Timestamp as CreatedOn,20000028 as RelationShip_Type,20000012 as Campaign_Task_Type_Id_Value,COALESCE(sns.IdempotencyId,sns.InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Internal_Marketing_Interaction_Id,sns.ProfileId as Target_Record_Id,sns.ProfileType as Target_Entity_Name,sns.CustomerJourneyId as Customer_Journey_Id,'Sms Not Sent to Journey' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note,20000019 as Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,sns.MessageId as Message_Id,'Sms Not Sent related Communication' as Message_Note FROM smsnotsent sns

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000029 as RelationShip_Type_JI ,JourneyRunId as Journey_Run_Id,'Sms Not Sent to Journey Instance' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM smsnotsent

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000030 as RelationShip_Type ,JourneyActionId as Journey_Action_Id,'Sms Not Sent to Journey Action' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM smsnotsent

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Campaign_Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,Timestamp as Org_Created_On,20000020 as Org_Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,OrganizationId as Org_Target_Record_Id FROM smsnotsent

Select po.Timestamp as modifiedon,po.Timestamp as CreatedOn,20000031 as RelationShip_Type,20000013 as Campaign_Task_Type_Id_Value,COALESCE(po.IdempotencyId,po.InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Internal_Marketing_Interaction_Id,po.ProfileId as Target_Record_Id,po.ProfileType as Target_Entity_Name,po.CustomerJourneyId as Customer_Journey_Id,'Push Notification Opened to Journey' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note,20000021 as Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,po.MessageId as Message_Id,'Push Notification Opened related Communication' as Message_Note FROM pushnotificationopened po

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000032 as RelationShip_Type_JI ,JourneyRunId as Journey_Run_Id,'Push Notification Opened to Journey Instance' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM pushnotificationopened

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000033 as RelationShip_Type ,JourneyActionId as Journey_Action_Id,'Push Notification Opened to Journey Action' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM pushnotificationopened

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Campaign_Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,Timestamp as Org_Created_On,20000022 as Org_Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,OrganizationId as Org_Target_Record_Id FROM pushnotificationopened

Select plc.Timestamp as modifiedon,plc.Timestamp as CreatedOn,20000034 as RelationShip_Type,20000014 as Campaign_Task_Type_Id_Value,COALESCE(plc.IdempotencyId,plc.InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Internal_Marketing_Interaction_Id,plc.ProfileId as Target_Record_Id,plc.ProfileType as Target_Entity_Name,plc.CustomerJourneyId as Customer_Journey_Id,'Push Notification Link Clicked to Journey' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note,20000023 as Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,plc.MessageId as Message_Id,'Push Notification Link Clicked related Communication' as Message_Note FROM pushnotificationlinkclicked plc

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000035 as RelationShip_Type_JI ,JourneyRunId as Journey_Run_Id,'Push Notification Link Clicked to Journey Instance' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM pushnotificationlinkclicked

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000036 as RelationShip_Type ,JourneyActionId as Journey_Action_Id,'Push Notification Link Clicked to Journey Action' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM pushnotificationlinkclicked

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Campaign_Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,Timestamp as Org_Created_On,20000024 as Org_Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,OrganizationId as Org_Target_Record_Id FROM pushnotificationlinkclicked

Select ps.Timestamp as modifiedon,ps.Timestamp as CreatedOn,20000037 as RelationShip_Type,20000015 as Campaign_Task_Type_Id_Value,COALESCE(ps.IdempotencyId,ps.InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Internal_Marketing_Interaction_Id,ps.ProfileId as Target_Record_Id,ps.ProfileType as Target_Entity_Name,ps.CustomerJourneyId as Customer_Journey_Id,'Push Notification Sent to Journey' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note,20000025 as Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,ps.MessageId as Message_Id,'Push Notification Sent related Communication' as Message_Note FROM pushnotificationsent ps

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000038 as RelationShip_Type_JI ,JourneyRunId as Journey_Run_Id,'Push Notification Sent to Journey Instance' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM pushnotificationsent

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000039 as RelationShip_Type ,JourneyActionId as Journey_Action_Id,'Push Notification Sent to Journey Action' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM pushnotificationsent

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Campaign_Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,Timestamp as Org_Created_On,20000026 as Org_Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,OrganizationId as Org_Target_Record_Id FROM pushnotificationsent

Select pns.Timestamp as modifiedon,pns.Timestamp as CreatedOn,20000040 as RelationShip_Type,20000016 as Campaign_Task_Type_Id_Value,COALESCE(pns.IdempotencyId,pns.InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Internal_Marketing_Interaction_Id,pns.ProfileId as Target_Record_Id,pns.ProfileType as Target_Entity_Name,pns.CustomerJourneyId as Customer_Journey_Id,'Push Notification Not Sent to Journey' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note,20000027 as Task_Party_Relationship_TypeId,pns.MessageId as Message_Id,'Push Notification Not Sent related Communication' as Message_Note FROM pushnotificationnotsent pns

select COALESCE(IdempotencyId,InternalMarketingInteractionId) as Task_Id,Timestamp as modifiedon,20000041 as RelationShip_Type_JI ,JourneyRunId as Journey_Run_Id,'Push Notification Not Sent to Journey Instance' as Marketing_Campaign_Task_Relationship_Note FROM pushnotificationnotsent
